DOC.brief_summary: The objective study compare efficacy , safety DU-176b 30mg DU-176b 15mg versus enoxaparin sodium prevention venous thromboembolism patient elective total hip arthroplasty .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 2b Study DU-176b , Prevention Venous Thromboembolism Patients After Total Hip Arthroplasty
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients undergo unilateral total hip arthroplasty 2 . Patients 2084 year olds 1 . Subjects risks hemorrhage 2 . Subjects thromboembolic risk 3 . Subjects weigh less 40 kg 4 . Subjects pregnant suspect pregnancy , subject want become pregnant
